content:
PROCEDURE CODE
 1179
If the inventory does not take place when the seals are unsealed, the notary summons all interested parties to the inventory operations at least eight days in advance by bailiff's writ or by registered letter. Where the parties concerned reside (...) outside the Kingdom, the summons shall be sent either to the agent appointed for this purpose or, if none has been appointed, to the notary appointed ex officio by the Justice of the Peace.
